categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic vehicles

nodes.text: Artillery units were mobile artillery units deployed on the battlefield by the Rebel Alliance.
The self-propelled artillery moved on tracks rather than repulsors and came in two models, single- and double-barrelled.
A few units were used during the Occupation of Reytha in 0 ABY.
Artillery units appear in the 2001 video game Star Wars: Galactic Battlegrounds and its 2002 expansion pack Clone Campaigns.
